headline: BALL's Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates, Sales Up Y/Y on Higher Volumes
summary: Ball Corp. beat Q4 EPS estimates as volumes and price/mix lifted sales to $3.35B, even as higher costs weighed on margins across segments.

headline: Ball Q4 Review: Great End To The Year, But It Is A Bit Expensive Now

headline: Ball (BALL) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
summary: Ball (BALL) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +1.60% and +7.59%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Ball (BALL) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates

headline: Ball: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Westminster, Colorado-based company said it had profit of 75 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to 91 cents per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Ball: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The Westminster, Colorado-based company said it had profit of 75 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to 91 cents per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

headline: Ball (NYSE:BALL) Surprises With Strong Q4 CY2025
summary: Packaging manufacturer Ball (NYSE:BLL) reported revenue ahead of Wall Streets expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 16.2% year on year to $3.35 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.91 per share was 1.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: Ball (NYSE:BALL) Surprises With Strong Q4 CY2025

headline: Ball Reports Strong Fourth Quarter and Full-Year 2025 Results
summary: Ball Corporation (NYSE: BALL) today reported full-year and fourth quarter 2025 results. References to net sales and comparable operating earnings in today's release do not include the company's former aerospace business. Year-over-year net earnings attributable to the corporation and comparable net earnings do include the performance of the company's former aerospace business through the sale date of February 16, 2024.
